title: MKL only supported on 32-bit machine?
body_html: according to mkl BUILD file and mkl util file, the current mkl code is only for 32-bit machine... And I didn't find the declaration of the functiondnnLayoutSerializationBufferSize_F32/64 in header files or .so files...
body_text: according to mkl BUILD file and mkl util file, the current mkl code is only for 32-bit machine... And I didn't find the declaration of the functiondnnLayoutSerializationBufferSize_F32/64 in header files or .so files...
body: according to [mkl BUILD file](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/mkl/BUILD#L20) and [mkl util file](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/util/mkl_util.h), the current mkl code is only for 32-bit machine... And I didn't find the declaration of the function`dnnLayoutSerializationBufferSize_F32/64` in header files or `.so` files...
